TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Maya_a_tademaw, title = Maya_a_tademaw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_a_tademaw} }

S.FORM: Maya a tademaw nu mukas nu intian a tademaw nu cacay, nu amilika nu liwan a sulit kilukuwan nu binacadan. 馬雅人 . pulung nu mihcaan i 2500 masabet tu kueneng nu heni i musike nu yuciyatun a subal, kuwatimala, paylise, atu salwatu, atu hungtulase,malakalak itidamueneng. nu maya a kamu. mukasi nu maya atademaw u singsngsnay u kacakat nu maya, widasa u sulit namakayni i amilika, yumahida henay , katukuh 16 a siki u sipanya a tademaw malimad tayda I amilika, kiyu u maya atademaw hida satu micumud i likisi, katukuh satu 19 a siki u maya atademaw idaw ku dadikuda tu nasadipaan maadih nu mikingkiway, winu u sakacakat kiyu maadih nu aydaay a tademaw. "maya:maydih kuheni mapulung kiyu wini ku ngangan nu heni, wiytiniay madih paini tu katineng nu lalangawan atu kamu kiyu siliwan tu tademaw atu kamu. nika itini idaw ku caay kalecad atademaw usiyakay atu pulung nu binacadan, uheni idaw naming ku misitekeday a lalungucan akakilulan, lalangawan atu likisi u misitekeday. yu 21 a siki nusayaway, idaw ku pitu alasubu nuemang a maya atademaw. Timulan nu musike, kuwatimala, paylise, salwatu,atu hung tu lase odaw henay ku yadahay a luwan nu mukasi a lalangawan nu nilacul. u maya atademaw milihida tu naming tu aydaay a nukaudip atu lalangawan, dumasa mududuc henay pakakilul tu daduducen a kakawsan, ina tademaw naming nu maya ku kamu mala tatudung nu kamu nu heni. Yu katuuday a maya atademaw makaala tu 1400 a emang nu tademaw. aydaay a maya a tademaw nikaudip nuheni tidamin I musike nu yulutun, cintanaluaw,tapaseke, atu ciyapase atu teban nu amilika akanatal nu subal paylise, kuwatimala hungtulase nu tipan atu salwatu. ayda u heni inayay tu kuni kasasuidng nu tawyaay ani katatulin tu kapah,caytu kasasuidang, sanuheni satu misiteket tu lalangawan atu kakawsan, caytu katineng tu likisi a lalangawan. Nika u maya a tademaw siliwan henay tu sapilihay lalangawan kakilulan nu siyakay, malalikeluh tu tayniay a tademaw malecad nu naming kuni kaudip, sisa u maya alalangawan idaw henay ayda. u nikaluk nuheni paluma tu kubkub,upuk,tamulak,keke,tubah,daydam,tabaku,kupa, u lala' idaw ku nu siyhu patulaka hank u bunawlan, tulu a mihcaan kinacacay amitulaka. nudikudan idaw ku sakunida atademaw atu mikul atu nikaaaepun, sakamusa u "tabakiay a tademaw" u nikasikawawsa duduc han u dayday ku mukilulay, mikuwan tu hitay.

Maya a tademaw no mokas no intian a tademaw no cacay, no amilika no liwan a solit kilokowan no binacadan. 馬雅人 . polong no mihcaan i 2500 masabet to koeneng no heni i mosike no yociyaton a sobal, kowatimala, paylise, ato salwato, ato hongtolase,malakalak itidamoeneng. no maya a kamo. mokasi no maya atademaw o singsngsnay o kacakat no maya, widasa o solit namakayni i amilika, yomahida henay , katokoh 16 a siki o sipanya a tademaw malimad tayda I amilika, kiyo o maya atademaw hida sato micomod i likisi, katokoh sato 19 a siki o maya atademaw idaw ko dadikoda to nasadipaan maadih no mikingkiway, wino o sakacakat kiyo maadih no aydaay a tademaw. "maya:maydih koheni mapolong kiyo wini ko ngangan no heni, wiytiniay madih paini to katineng no lalangawan ato kamo kiyo siliwan to tademaw ato kamo. nika itini idaw ko caay kalecad atademaw osiyakay ato polong no binacadan, oheni idaw naming ko misitekeday a lalongocan akakilolan, lalangawan ato likisi o misitekeday. yo 21 a siki nosayaway, idaw ko pito alasobo noemang a maya atademaw. Timolan no mosike, kowatimala, paylise, salwato,ato hong to lase odaw henay ko yadahay a lowan no mokasi a lalangawan no nilacol. o maya atademaw milihida to naming to aydaay a nokaodip ato lalangawan, domasa mododoc henay pakakilol to dadodocen a kakawsan, ina tademaw naming no maya ko kamo mala tatodong no kamo no heni. Yo katooday a maya atademaw makaala to 1400 a emang no tademaw. aydaay a maya a tademaw nikaodip noheni tidamin I mosike no yoloton, cintanaloaw,tapaseke, ato ciyapase ato teban no amilika akanatal no sobal paylise, kowatimala hongtolase no tipan ato salwato. ayda o heni inayay to koni kasasoidng no tawyaay ani katatolin to kapah,cayto kasasoidang, sanoheni sato misiteket to lalangawan ato kakawsan, cayto katineng to likisi a lalangawan. Nika o maya a tademaw siliwan henay to sapilihay lalangawan kakilolan no siyakay, malalikeloh to tayniay a tademaw malecad no naming koni kaodip, sisa o maya alalangawan idaw henay ayda. o nikalok noheni paloma to kobkob,opok,tamolak,keke,tobah,daydam,tabako,kopa, o lala' idaw ko no siyho patolaka hank o bonawlan, tolo a mihcaan kinacacay amitolaka. nodikodan idaw ko sakonida atademaw ato mikol ato nikaaaepon, sakamosa o "tabakiay a tademaw" o nikasikawawsa dodoc han o dayday ko mokilolay, mikowan to hitay.
